hero: Our lawyers assist companies, organisations and business clients within a wide range of markets

footer.title: Stray Vyrje assists companies, organisations and business clients within a wide range of markets. Our attorneys have extensive experience in Business and Private Law, Sports and Intellectual Property Rights

content.p1: Areas of actuation comprises of Labour, Contract and Corporate Law. In addition our lawyers have significant experience with negotiation and litigation.
content.p2: As a client with Stray Vyrje you will meet solution-oriented lawyers that are dedicated and available.
content.p3: Contact one of our partners today, to explore what we can achieve together.

contactPage.title: Contact us
contactPage.formTitle: Leave a message and we will contact you as soon as possible
contactPage.openingHoursP1: Switchboard is served on weekdays between 09.00 - 12.30 and 13.00 - 17.00
contactPage.openingHoursP2: Inquiries after office hours are directed directly to the lawyers
contactPage.openingHoursP3: For visits, contact us for an appointment

aboutUsPage.title: About us
aboutUsPage.p1: Stray Vyrje assists companies, organisations and business clients within a wide range of markets. Our attorneys have extensive experience in Business and Private Law, Sports and Intellectual Property Rights.
aboutUsPage.p2: Areas of actuation comprises of Labour, Contract and Corporate Law. In addition our lawyers have significant experience with negotiation and litigation. As a client with Stray Vyrje you will meet solution-oriented lawyers that are dedicated and available.
aboutUsPage.p3: Contact one of our partners today, to explore what we can achieve together.
aboutUsPage.feesP1: Our hourly rate ranges from EUR 250 – 400 (ex VAT) depending on the size and complexity of the assignment.
